Articles.Content:
I actually cleared my inbox.

My inbox.

i build a new hill.

My hill.

I invade your hill and capture it.

My hill.

I make it feel unwell.

My ill hill.

I shoot it with a orbital laser and reclaim it.

My burnt hill.

I hurt your feelings, making you run away.

My emotional hill.

I nuke your hill and build a nuclear bunker on it.

My radioactive crater with a bunker in it.

I black hole you to death.

Krakens love me now, they protect my hill in the centre of a black hole.

I build a new hill.

My hill.
My black hole swallows you and your hill. My hill(s).

I build a hill on Laythe so it is immune to your black hole.

My extraplanetary hill.

I send a huge tornado from a video game to Laythe to destroy your hill.

My tornado from a particular Dontnod+Square Enix game.

I send sharks into your tornado making it a SHARKnado!

My sharknado.

Sharks banned.

My tornado.

I launch a car filled with tanks of explosive liquid into the tornado destroying it.

My ripped apart hill.

I teleport to a coastal town in Oregon and make a new tornado there.

My tornado.

I turn my ruined hill into a mountain with a upside down eiffel tower.

My mountain with a upside down eiffel tower on laythe.

You did that on Laythe, not earth.

My tornado.

I build a wall around my mountain.

My wall around a mountain with a upside down eiffel tower on laythe.

(Also there's no rule about having stuff only on earth).

I hit everyone of you, killing you all dead.

My new hill on Triton with Krakens guarding me.

I build a hill on Tekto

My hill on Tekto.

I get a black hole to swallow your hill and give it to me.

My hills on Triton.

I send nukes to all of your hills to capture them.

My nuked hills.

I burn you.

My nuked hills.

I build a space hill in orbit.

My space hill.
